content:
Hi everyone,
the University of Pisa is looking for PhD students on the topic of “Foundations of quantum computing: mathematical aspects, algorithms and programming languages”.
I attach here all the info. The deadline to apply is 7th of August.
Unfortunately the linked page is in Italian only but, if it sounds interesting to you, please reach to Prof. Filippo Bonchi (filippo.bonchi@gmail.com) or Prof. Fabio Gadducci (fabio.gadducci@unipi.it).
